title: Dazzling Diamond Delight: Contemporary Panchaloha Haaram
materials: Crafted in Panchaloha (five-metal alloy) with brilliant-cut Diamonds. Features a Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance and shine. Diamond carat weight: 136.740 (GH).
features: This modern Haaram features a cascading design with five graduated strands. Each strand is meticulously crafted with alternating floral and geometric diamond settings, showcasing exceptional brilliance. The design blends traditional Haaram length with contemporary styling, making it both timeless and trendy.
colors: Brilliant white Diamonds set against a subtle
lustrous Panchaloha base. The cool-toned color palette exudes sophistication and elegance.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable for Seemantham ceremonies when a contemporary twist is desired. Ideal for adding a touch of elegance to any outfit.
description: A modern interpretation of the classic South Indian Haaram. The brilliance of the diamonds, combined with the durable Panchaloha setting, ensures both lasting beauty and value. Its multi-strand design is an instant showstopper, making it a worthy investment for your jewelry collection. Exudes modern elegance with traditional roots.
